entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 22. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Friday 24 March 2023
